From clue 6, we know the person watching epic movies is the coach.

From clue 9, we know the coach is somewhere to the left of the person watching comedy movies.

From clue 10, we know the coach is somewhere to the right of the bartender.

Combining clues 5 and 7, we can deduce that the architect must be on the far left or far right. Since they're not drinking iced-tea (clue 11), they must be on the far left.

Now we have a partial table:


|               |     1     |   2   |    3     |      4      |
| Beverage      | ?         |       |          | iced-tea    |
| Job           | architect | coach |          | mechanic    |
| Movie-Genre   | epic      | comedy|          |             |

From clue 1, we know the person drinking iced-tea is to the left of the person watching adventure movies.

Since the coach is watching epic movies and the mechanic is on the far right, the person watching adventure movies must be in column 4. This means the person drinking iced-tea (mechanic) is in column 3 or 2.

But from clue 9, we know the coach is to the left of the person watching comedy movies. So, the coach can't be in column 3 (since iced-tea is). The coach must be in column 2.

Now we have:


|               |     1     |   2   |    3     |      4      |
| Beverage      | ?         |       |          | iced-tea    |
| Job           | architect | coach |          | mechanic    |
| Movie-Genre   | epic      | comedy|          | adventure   |

From clue 8, we know the coach is not to the left of the person drinking milk.

Since the architect is on the far left and can't be drinking iced-tea (clue 11), they must be drinking milk.


|               |     1     |   2   |    3     |      4      |
| Beverage      | milk      |       |          | iced-tea    |
| Job           | architect | coach |          | mechanic    |
| Movie-Genre   | epic      | comedy|          | adventure   |

From clue 5, we know the person watching comedy movies is on the left or right of the architect.

Since the coach is already in column 2 and watching epic movies, the person watching comedy movies must be in column 3.


|               |     1     |   2   |    3     |      4      |
| Beverage      | milk      |       |          | iced-tea    |
| Job           | architect | coach |          | mechanic    |
| Movie-Genre   | epic      | comedy| superhero | adventure   |

Now, from clue 2 and the fact that the coach is watching epic movies, we know the person drinking almond-milk must be in column 3.


|               |     1     |   2   |    3     |      4      |
| Beverage      | milk      |       |almond-milk| iced-tea    |
| Job           | architect | coach |          | mechanic    |
| Movie-Genre   | epic      | comedy| superhero | adventure   |

Finally, from clue 4 and the fact that the coach is in column 2, we know the person drinking juice must be in column 3 or 1. Since almond-milk is already in column 3, juice must be in column 1.


But wait! We can't have juice in column 1 because then milk would be out of place. So, juice must be in column 3 and almond-milk must be in column 1... no, that's not it!

Actually, I made a mistake earlier. Let me correct the table:


|               |     1     |   2   |    3     |      4      |
| Beverage      | milk      | juice |almond-milk| iced-tea    |
| Job           | architect | coach |          | mechanic    |
| Movie-Genre   | epic      | comedy| superhero | adventure   |

And from clue 10, we know the bartender must be in column 3.


|               |     1     |   2   |    3     |      4      |
| Beverage      | milk      | juice |almond-milk| iced-tea    |
| Job           | architect | coach | bartender| mechanic    |
| Movie-Genre   | epic      | comedy| superhero | adventure   |

There you go! The puzzle is solved.
